it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties

Class ReplicationListenerContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.ReplicationListenerContainer

  • public class ReplicationListenerContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The class provides an helper for implementing Replicating interface. That interface allows the implementer to make its replications observable to implementations of ReplicationListener.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Collection<ReplicationListener> listeners
      The read-only collection of registered listeners exposed to inheriting classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReplicationListenerContainer(ReplicationListener... listeners)
      Creates the container and registers the given listeners.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isListenerRegistered(ReplicationListener listener)
      Checks if the given listener is registered.
      void registerListener(ReplicationListener listener)
      Registers a replication listener to the container.
      void tellReplicated(Replicating original, Replicating copy)
      Tells the listeners that a replication happened.
      boolean unregisterListener(ReplicationListener listener)
      Unregisters a replication listener to the container.
